email.subject: Defeated Notif. - System Restoration
email.body:
#PLAYERNAME#,
Battleboard automated systems have detected that you have lost a recent battle.
Under Hacker_Wars ruling you are allowed to re-attempt the battle, but only if you can recover your system to a usable state.
Use your BACKUP server to restore your x-server and/or executables.
Once you're back online, head back to the battleboard to retry your last battle.
